tech.name: Technology Expert
tech.description: With meticulously crafted Prompts, translations in the technology field become more accurate and professional.

zh-CN.name: 科技类翻译专家
zh-CN.description: 专为科技领域设计，提供更准确、专业的科技领域翻译

zh-TW.name: 科技類翻譯專家
zh-TW.description: 專為科技領域設計，提供更準確、專業的科技領域翻譯

medical.name: Medical Expert
medical.description: With meticulously crafted Prompts, translations in the medical field become more accurate and professional.

zh-CN.name: 医学专家
zh-CN.description: 适合用来翻译医学相关的网站、论文、报告等内容

zh-TW.name: 醫學專家
zh-TW.description: 適合用來翻譯醫學相關的網站、論文、報告等內容

legal.name: Legal Expert
legal.description: With meticulously crafted Prompts, translations in the legal field become more accurate and professional.

zh-CN.name: 法律专家
zh-CN.description: 专为法律行业优化，适合用来翻译法律相关的网站、论文、报告等内容

zh-TW.name: 法律專家
zh-TW.description: 專為法律行業優化，適合用來翻譯法律相關的網站、論文、報告等內容

financial.name: Financial Expert
financial.description: With carefully designed Prompts, the translation of financial articles becomes more accurate and professional.

zh-CN.name: 金融专家
zh-CN.description: 特别为金融领域优化，适合用来翻译财经，金融类文章。

zh-TW.name: 金融專家
zh-TW.description: 特別為金融領域優化，適合用來翻譯財經，金融類文章。

dbh.name: Northeastern Expert
dbh.description: Northeastern Dialect is a unique and interesting dialect in China. This expert is designed to help you translate text into Northeastern Dialect.

zh-CN.name: 东北话专家
zh-CN.description: 哎呀，这天儿冷得慌，咱们得赶紧回家烤火去。

zh-TW.name: 東北話翻譯
zh-TW.description: 哎呀，這天兒冷得慌，咱們得趕緊回家烤火去。

bilingual-mix.name: Chinglish mixing
bilingual-mix.description: When translating from Chinese to English, only key words are translated into English while other words are kept in Chinese. This can help deepen the user's memory of important vocabulary.

zh-CN.name: 中英夹杂
zh-CN.description: 不好意思，我明天的 schedule 满了，让我 book 后天的时间好吗？

zh-TW.name: 中英夾雜
zh-TW.description: 不好意思，我明天的 schedule 滿了，讓我 book 後天的時間好嗎？
